member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema id="SchemaValidator" targetNamespace="urn:xmlbindings-shema" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn:xmlbindings-shema" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<xs:element name="Bindings" type="bindingsXsType"/>
<xs:complexType name="bindingsXsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Binding" type="bindingXsType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:s [rest of string was truncated]";.
